title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, installable via npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing use of local Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Cookbook showing how to plug Ollama models into Chainlit conversational UI.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama supporting code highlighting, latex, multimodal, RAG, etc.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent API and reactive streams.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) template using Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model in Discord servers.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension backed by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor and chat with code using Ollama LLMs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and model auto-pull.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfiles for creating custom Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that integrates Ollama models into Slack channels with thread support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API with serde models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers and tests in CI pipelines reproducibly.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda Connectors providing Ollama tasks for BPMN workflows (generate, classify, summarize).

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on notes via Ollama for summarization and Q&A.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components for pipelines.
